word:
In the Early Days, The Workers Were Medical Missionaries, 
                and the Power of God was Manifest 
                   in the Healing of the Sick. 

H. 191'05 (July 5, 1905):-- 


     The end of all things is at hand. The signs foretold by Christ are fast fulfilling. The nations are angry, and the time of the dead has come, that they should be judged. There are stormy times before us, but let us not utter one word of unbelief or discouragement. Let us remember that we bear a message of healing to a world filled with sinsick souls.
